constituent: peel off, dustpan, broom, grains of rice, sword, sabre, saber
kunYomi: へ.ぐ、へず.る、む.く、む.ける、は.がれる、は.ぐ、は.げる、は.がす
readingExamples: 剥がす (は.がす), 剥ぐ (は.ぐ)
words: to tear off, to peel off, to rip off, to strip off, to skin, to flay, to disrobe, to deprive of, to detach, to disconnect
to tear off, to peel off, to rip off, to strip off, to skin, to flay, to disrobe, to deprive of
to come off, to be worn off, to fade, to discolor
